new deep neural network architecture.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a new deep neural network architecture to model the strong interactions of two sentences .

two interdependent ways.from sentence: Specifically , we propose two interdependent ways for the coupled - LSTMs : loosely coupled model ( LC - LSTMs ) and tightly coupled model ( TC - LSTMs ) .

two interdependent LSTMs.from sentence: Different with modelling two sentences with separated LSTMs , we utilize two interdependent LSTMs , called coupled - LSTMs , to fully affect each other at different time steps .

adopt.from sentence: To utilize all the information of four directions of coupled - LSTMs , we aggregate them and adopt a dynamic pooling strategy to automatically select the most informative interaction signals .

feed them into.from sentence: Finally , we feed them into a fully connected layer , followed by an output layer to compute the matching score .

output.from sentence: The output of coupled - LSTMs at each step depends on both sentences .
